page.title: 03Leisure and Recreation
page.content: I spend my free time away from school{swimming}and going to {Youth Clubs.}My Mum plays{Bingo}and my Dad goes{fishing}along the River Thames where there are many boats. Our family like to go for a{walk}along the green river bank. My sister goes {horseriding}and enjoys{cooking.}My brother enjoys coming to school and playing{tennis,}doing{archery,swimming and playing{basketball,}but usually we go to play in the{playpark. Some families go to{Windsor {Racecourse}to watch the races, but not my family as we enjoy more peaceful activities and it is always crowded at the racecourse. There are some new hobbies like {nature preservation, ornithology, {fantasy roleplaying}and also new sports like{aerobics}and{gymnastics.
